<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 8"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Heal Mount](/Feats.aspx?ID=233) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Champion" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=24" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 113 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

**Prerequisites**
[divine ally (steed)](/Classes.aspx?ID=4); devotion spell ([_lay on hands_](/Spells.aspx?ID=395))

</column>

---

Your devotion to your mount manifests as a surge of positive energy. When you cast [_lay on hands_](/Spells.aspx?ID=395) on your mount, you can restore 10 Hit Points, plus 10 for each heightened level.
name: Heal Mount
prerequisite: divine ally (steed); devotion spell (_lay on hands_)
